tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (NP (S (S (NP (PRP$ My) (NN dad)) (VP (VBZ has) (S (NP (DT a) (CD million) (NN life) (NN lesson)) (VP (TO to) (VP (VB tell) (NP (PRP me) (JJ everyday))))))) (CC and) (S (NP (PRP he)) (VP (VBZ starts) (PP (IN with) (NP (PRP them))) (SBAR (ADVP (RB right)) (WHADVP (WRB when)) (S (NP (FW i)) (VP (VBP wake) (PRT (RP up))))))))))
